GSD.product_version: versions from v3.15 to before v4.14.300
GSD.description:
drbd: use after free in drbd_create_device()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.300 by commit fc1897f16ebcfd22364f2afcc27f53a740f3bc7a, it was introduced in version v3.15 by commit b6f85ef9538b2111a8ba0bbfae9aaebabfc94961. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: drbd: use after free in drbd_create_device()
